headline.main: Georgia Park Adds Features As Critics Fret

lead_paragraph: An indoor playground has opened at Stone Mountain Park in a defeat for those who complained that the park, a Confederate memorial, was becoming too commercialized. The Great Barn, a playhouse designed like a 19th-century barn, is the first stage in a redevelopment plan by Silver Dollar City Inc., which leased the park from Georgia in 1998.
abstract: Indoor playground opens at Stone Mountain Park, Georgia, in defeat for those who complained that park, a Confederate memorial, is becoming too commercialized; Great Barn, playhouse designed like 19th-century barn, is first stage in redevelopment plan by Silver Dollar City Inc, which leased park from Georgia in 1998; Stone Mountain is sort of Mount Rushmore of Confederacy, carved with images of Jefferson Davis, Robert E Lee and Stonewall Jackson (S)
